content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "What is your name?"
[Answer] "My name is Emilia Müller."

[Question] "With whom did you have this conversation?"
[Answer] "I had this conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt from Germany."

[Question] "What was the main topic of this conversation?"
[Answer] "The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg."

[Question] "Did you agree on a final price?"
[Answer] "Yes"
name: Emilia Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "Did you agree on a final price?"
[Answer] "Yes"

[Question] "If yes, what was the final price?"
[Answer] "The final price we agreed upon was 406 euros per month."
name: Emilia Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner?"
[Answer] "I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Mr. Schmidt, as a 7."
name: Emilia Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "At any point of the negotiation, did you feel discriminated or offended?"
[Answer] "No"
name: Emilia Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?"
[Answer] "No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation."
name: Emilia Müller
